title: Mandy Moore to Star in Erotic Thriller 'Teach Me' for Peacock and A24
summary: Peacock has ordered the limited series 'Teach Me,' an erotic thriller that reunites 'This Is Us' star Mandy Moore with the NBCUniversal fold. Created and written by Lisa Rubin, the show follows Sadie, a married mother who hires a tutor and is pulled into a dangerous attraction that threatens her family and career. Moore is attached to lead and executive produce alongside A24 and Universal Television, with Jessica Rhoades' Pacesetter Productions and Alison Mo Massey and Brendan Fitzgerald for A24 also executive producing.
